snippet: Eric Ohena Lembembe was found dead in his home in Yaoundé, shortly after he wrote about attacks on organizations that support gay rights. Cameroon is one of 38 African countries that criminalize homosexuality.
abstract: Eric Ohena Lembembe was found dead in his home in Yaoundé, shortly after he wrote about attacks on organizations that support gay rights. Cameroon is one of 38 African countries that criminalize homosexuality.

headline.main: Prominent Gay Rights Activist Is Found Dead in Cameroon

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
